weight.description: Weight associated with matching the corresponding podAffinityTerm, in the range 1-100.

preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringEx.title: PreferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution defines the weight of the anti-affinity injection

requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExe.title: RequiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution defines inter-pod scheduling rule to be RequiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution

title: AntiAffinity defines which inter-pod scheduling rule to use for anti-affinity injection
